title: Spokanistan51
author: Spokanistan51
created_time: August 27, 2022, 06:05:56 PMLast edit: January 22, 2023, 06:13:31 AM by Spokanistan51
content: 509 Bitcoin Trader is proud to offer our new custom limited edition DIY Bitcoin cold storage poker style chips! Each purchase includes 1x 509 chip in an Airtite foam protective holder, 2x unused custom gold security holograms, and 1x 509 Bitcoin Trader custom storage case. The storage cases also fit graded and slabbed pieces from ICG, ANACS, and NCGS nicely so they double as storage protection for most of your graded pieces also.A total of 100 black and orange chips will be offered to Bitcointalk members at a discounted price for payment in BTC. Total mintage 500.Bticointalk members only discounted price of .0018 BTC + shipping. If paying in USD, price is $44.99. Venmo and Paypal acceptedShipped USPS with tracking. Shipping cost is $4.99 for domestic U.S.A. and $19.99 for international.Escrow and re-shipping through MJ upon requestCross Posted on Ebay and other BTC collectible forumsDiscounts available for purchases in quantityFollow and message us on FB at facebook.com/509bitcointrader509 Bitcoin Trader - "Bitcoin You Can Touch"

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: each poker chip is $50? or is it a set?

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 27, 2022, 06:10:47 PMeach poker chip is $50? or is it a set?Hi Mopar, each package includes 1x chip, 2x unused gold holograms, 1x case as noted above in OP. Thanks

ThanksÂ  seems a bit steep for a single chip even with the packaging. I thought maybe it was a set of chips.

comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 27, 2022, 06:59:59 PMQuote from: Spokanistan51 on August 27, 2022, 06:55:29 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 27, 2022, 06:10:47 PMeach poker chip is $50? or is it a set?Hi Mopar, each package includes 1x chip, 2x unused gold holograms, 1x case as noted above in OP. ThanksÂ  seems a bit steep for a single chip even with the packaging. I thought maybe it was a set of chips. Each set includes 6x items: 1x 509 chip, 1x foam plastic Air-tite, 2x 509 holograms, 1x hologram plastic case, 1x 509 storage foam case, and custom packaging. All of these items cost $$$, as you know. With inflation, designing, manufacturing, shipping, and fees projects are not cheap these days. .002 isn't much over my cost for forum members, but hey it's a free market! No broken fingers here if you decide not to purchase my friend.
